Thanks for your reply. To answer your question is tough because it might vary based on the client we are working with. In some situations when the client is creditworthy we will deposit funds for the worker once the invoice is delivered; however in most cases we pay the worker once we receive payment from the client; there are no guarantee’s of payment. If the client does not pay, we do not pay. I hope this helps answer your question.
Steve
